node.doctext:
"Surpass the impossible and kick off with momentum!"

The goals of E2Drills are threefold:

  • To educate the uninitiated on the myriad aspects of drills and drill culture.
  • To encourage a healthy appreciation of drills and those who use them.
  • To discuss important drill-related activities, including (but not limited to) boring, burrowing, delving, exhumation, excavation, grinding, and of course, digging.

Allow us to fill that hole in your heart with a giant drill bit. The world will seem like a brighter place.
node.title: e2drills
